description: Founded and currently working on building a tech-focused student community that offers learning events, CTF challenges, workshops, and a space for students to connect, learn, and grow.
Founded and manage NeevCode, a personalized learning platform connecting students through peer-to-peer education, offering customized curriculums and mentorship.
Created educational content on cybersecurity topics like network security and ethical hacking.
Performed reconnaissance, vulnerability analysis, and simulated exploitation in a test environment.
Delivered cybersecurity training on phishing, social engineering, and safe digital practices to high school students.
Designed and delivered online robotics courses, teaching Arduino and sensor integration to students.
